notes: Carbon dioxide emissions are those stemming from the burning of fossil fuels and the manufacture of cement. They include carbon dioxide produced during consumption of solid, liquid, and gas fuels and gas flaring. This dataset includes the carbon dioxide emission in Nepal in terms of metric tons per capita.The data is obtained from http://data.worldbank.org/indicator/EN.ATM.CO2E.PC/countries/NP-8S?display=graph.
